title: The Haunted Hotel
short_cast: Luna Maya, Christian Sugiono, Bianca Hello, Egi Fedly, Rafael Adwel, Firstriana Aldila, Budi Ros, Oce Permatasari, Landung Simatupang, Ivonne Dahler
cast: Luna Maya, Christian Sugiono, Bianca Hello, Egi Fedly, Rafael Adwel, Firstriana Aldila, Budi Ros, Oce Permatasari, Landung Simatupang, Ivonne Dahler
desc: Two sisters travel to Semarang to help manage a mysterious hotel where they encounter a dark secret and a deadly curse.
